body.name: VIZIO 24-inch D-Series HD 720p Smart TV (D24h) with AirPlay and Chromecast Built-in, Screen Mirroring, & 150+ Free Streaming Channels Bundle with Cable Ties and Microfiber
features: This VIZIO D-Series 24" Class 720p HD LED Smart TV comes with all the manufacturer accessories and a 1-year USA warranty along with a 3-piece bundle which includes 2x Mophead cable ties and Circuit City premium microfiber cloth.
720p High-Definition - Watch TV in crisp, clear 720p HD resolution and experience a brilliant picture with the VIZIO D-Series.
LED Backlight - Evenly distributed LEDs across the screen’s backlight deliver superior light uniformity and picture performance.

Smart Home Ready - Your VIZIO SmartCast TV integrates seamlessly with popular voice assistants to give you a comprehensive smart home experience. Use your voice to control your TV and more, without ever leaving your couch.

WatchFree+ - WatchFree+ is like cable TV, but streaming and free. Watch hundreds of channels of live TV and on demand content including news, sports, movies, TV shows and foreign language programming across an ever-expanding catalog. No logins. No subscriptions. No fees. Just free entertainment.
body.description: Enjoy smart TV functionality with voice control via your favorite virtual assistant with the VIZIO D-Series (D24h) 24" Class HD Smart LED TV. The onboard SmartCast OS lets you watch free and premium content from a variety of service providers. Instantly access millions of titles with America's Smart TV. Stream shows, movies, news, sports, music, and more on all your favorite apps, and enjoy over 250 free channels on WatchFree+. D-Series seamlessly integrates with popular smart home devices, so you can do things like check your front door camera, sync your TV and room lighting, and control the TV just by using your voice.Apple AirPlay and Chromecast built-in are supported by the TV, so you can cast apps directly from your compatible smart device to the TV over your Wi-Fi network. Its two HDMI ports provide connections to digital HD devices such as Blu-ray Disc players, cable/satellite boxes, gaming systems, and more. You can control the TV with your voice through your Google Assistant-, Siri- or Amazon Alexa-enabled device or SmartCast Mobile app.SpecificationsScreen Size: 23.5"Display Technology: LEDAspect Ratio: 16:9Resolution: 1366 x 768Lighting System: LED BacklightRefresh Rate: 60HzInput Lag: Less Than 10ms @60Hz (All Resolutions)Display Processor: IQ ProcessorInput Ports: 2x HDMI Type A (HDMI 1.4), 1x F-Type, 1x RCAVirtual Assistant Support: Amazon Alexa, Apple Siri, Google AssistantWi-Fi: Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n); Dual-Band (2.4 and 5 GHz)USB Ports: 1x USB 2.0VESA Mounting: 100mm x 100mmDimensions: 21.82 x 13.28 x 2.34"Weight: 6 lbsIncludesVIZIO 24" D-Series (D24h) HD 720p Smart TVVIZIO RemoteVIZIO 1-Year WarrantyMophead Cable Management Ties (2)Circuit City Premium Microfiber Cloth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little TV for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Love this TV - bought it for my RV. It has a great picture, good sound, mounted quickly and easily to my wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Deal for a Vizio TV
reviews.reviewText: This a great tv and a great deal the picture is outstanding and I use it in my kitchen I m very impressed at how well everything looks I would buy this again! The 1080 pixel and full HD is top quality for the price you can’t beat it it’s a steal. Everything that is offered and everything you get besides the tv you can’t go wrong Im happy to have a smart tv in my kitchen now. I couldn’t be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: We needed a good tv for a small room. 1080i is hard to find in 24 inch TVs, so I was glad to find this one. The picture is excellent. The sound is not when we have to turn it up with the window AC. I did have issues with connecting to WiFi - until I realized the tv was in the power saving mode. Once I took it out of the power saving mode, I've had very few issues with the WiFi. Huge difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our use
reviews.reviewText: We put this tv in our kitchen. The picture is great and sound is clear. It was very easy to install and set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zero stars! Complete waste of time literally, you'll age 2 years everytime you turn it on
reviews.reviewText: Do not bother, this tv is the slowest thing on the planet. Ill never buy another visio ever again. I have 5 tvs on the property all samsung smart tvs ranging from 30 to 60in. I couldn't find a smaller samsung smart tv so I got this. Huge huge huge mistake. It's going back, tho I'll never get back the 3 hours it took of my life waiting for it to update, or the 20 minutes it takes to turn on everytime, or the 3 minutes it takes to go from choosing an app, like Hulu, to the loading screen, which then consistently fails and restarts the tv. The wifi on it sucks. It is literally 1 foot from a net gear night hawk. And only pics up 2 bars, plugged it in via ethernet and it was exactly the same. Complete trash, I can't believe I have to waste my own time to unmount rebox and Shipp this garbage back. Don't make the mistake I did. Just buy a non smart tv, and put Amazon stick or whatever on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This TV is wonderful and it's worth every penny.
reviews.reviewText: I love this TV. The picture is exquisite and the setup was easy. I'm older and so any time setting any Electronics up is easy it's a miracle. I recommend this TV to everyone I know. I love Vizio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only have one small issue and it's my fault.
reviews.reviewText: We got 2 of these to use as computer monitors for my parents. They love them, except when using the remote control it does both tv's. It would be nice to have the ability to change the frequency on them so they can be controlled individually. We did figure out how to use the power button on the screen to modify input source as needed so we are ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Picture but the Sound was Terrible
reviews.reviewText: I was on the search for a 1080p 24" TV for our kitchen and thought I had found it. The TV is nicely designed, the picture is great, and the remote easy to use. The sound was very bad and hard to make out speech with any background noise, music, or sound effects. Half of the shows or movies that I tried I couldn't understand the actors, no matter how loud I turned it up. Very "tinny" sound and a tiny speaker with limited range. I thought it was broken so sent it back and Amazon sent a new one. The same problem, so it is a Vizio speaker problem. We listen to the TV more than watch it in the kitchen, so this wasn't going to work. Bought an LG instead.The smart TV works great but it does have one drawback. If you don't see the "app" you want on their list, you are out of luck. At the time of this review, it won't let you add additional apps to your list. Most of the popular ones are on there but no PBS or PBS Kids. Not to mention a number of others that we enjoy but you do get Netflix, Prime, VUDU, HULU, Movies Anywhere, CBS, NBC, and a bunch of others.
